LanguageData:
Mod name<--> Pawnkind Race Diversity
Labels<--> Debug mode Override all human pawnkinds Override all alien pawnkinds Override pawns with inconsistent ages
Descriptions<--> Prints out more information to the debug console. You should leave this off unless you are troubleshooting this mod. Allows the random race weight selection procedure to override the races of pawnkinds that were originally hardcoded as humans. Defaults to true. Allows the random race weight selection procedure to override the races of pawnkinds that were originally hardcoded as certain alien races. Defaults to false. Allows overriding pawns that have ages that are inconsistent with what age they are supposed to be from their pawnkind (ex: children, skeletons, etc with human ages). Defaults to false.
